EmailTemplate.name: LI Commercial Activity License Association Error
EmailTemplate.subject: Commercial Activity License Association Error
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear License Holder,
Thank you for your inquiry. The error was due to the creation of multiple Commercial Activity Licenses (CALs); we have removed the redundant CALs to correct the issue and you may now log back in to proceed.
Please log in to the eCLIPSE system here.
Once logged in, the information required to associate your License with your Account is as follows: Activity License #: XXXX City of Philadelphia Tax Account #: XXXX Social Security Number (SSN) OR Employer Identification Number (EIN): XXXX
Please reply to this email if you experience any further issues related to this. We appreciate your patience and thank you for your investment in the City of Philadelphia.
Sincerely, Customer Care Staff Department of L & I
